sentence.Network_en: Praises for Dr. Bethune's spirit of internationalism are always on the lips of the Chinese people.
sentence.Network_cn: 白求恩大夫的国际主义精神,一直为中国人民广泛传颂.

sentence.Network_en: Dr. Norman Bethune impersonates the spirit of proletarian internationalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 白求恩医生体现了无产阶级国际主义精神.

sentence.Network_en: To do so would be running counter to proletarian internationalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样做,就会违反无产阶级国际主义.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 国际主义（英文：internationalism）是指倡导和支持国家间为共同利益而开展更广泛的经济和政治合作的政治运动。不同国家和地区 …

entry.tran: 国际主义;国际友好合作观
entry.def: Internationalism is the belief that countries should work with, help, and be friendly with one another.

means.word_mean: 1. the doctrine that nations should cooperate because their common interests are more important than their differences
2. quality of being international in scope;

sentences.sentence: "he applauded the internationality of scientific terminology"
